name: TURBO SPACE COFFIN DELUXE
description:
Instructions:
Select building with buttons along the bottom, some buildings have build limits and all have a cost.
You can only build on the power lines (where the power packets are going)
Signal Amplifiers increase the clock speed

Tips:

DON'T BUILD IN THE CENTRAL CLOCK/HEART
Collectors will always eat the packet that flows under the, utilise dead ends!
Batteries share stockpiled power with nearby turrets!
Purple cube on power lines are inhibitors, place a transmitter nearby to nullify and open up the power lanes!
